effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

short_effect.sun-moon: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat by preventing its movement.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat by preventing its movement.
